name: asynciterator
description: An asynchronous iterator library for advanced object pipelines.
author: Ruben Verborgh <ruben@verborgh.org>

scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run build:module && npm run build:commonjs && npm run build:types
scripts.build:module: tsc --module es2015 && mv dist/ts-out/*.js dist && npm run build:module:import
scripts.build:commonjs: tsc --module commonjs && ./.change-extension cjs dist/ts-out/*.js && mv dist/ts-out/*.cjs dist && npm run build:commonjs:import
scripts.build:types: tsc -d && rm dist/ts-out/*.js && mv dist/ts-out/*.d.ts dist
scripts.test: npm run build:module && npm run test:microtask
scripts.docs: npm run build:module && npm run jsdoc
